quote: The whole problem with the world is the fools and fanatics are always so sure of themselves, and wiser people are full of doubts. – George Bernard Shaw
fact: John Lennon`s first girlfriend was named Thelma Pickles.
joke: Why do scuba divers fall backwards into the water? Because if they fell forwards they’d still be in the boat.
